text: Clark James Gable (September 20, 1988 â€“ February 22, 2019), also known as Clark Gable III, was an American actor, model, and television presenter. He was born in Malibu, California. Gable was a past host of the television reality show Cheaters from the 13th to the 15th seasons. His grandfather was actor Clark Gable. Gable was found dead on February 22, 2019 in Dallas, Texas of an accidental fentanyl overdose, aged 30. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Clark James Gable Biography on Cheaters website * Clark James Gable - Official Website Category:1988 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Drug- related accidental deaths in the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television presenters Category:Models from California Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Malibu, California
title: Clark James Gable
